channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-10562] Namenode exits on exception without printing stack trace in AbstractDelegationTokenSecretManager
item.description: Not printing the stack trace makes debugging harder.
item.summary: Namenode exits on exception without printing stack trace in AbstractDelegationTokenSecretManager

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Patch to print the exception stack trace

+1 for the patch.

Also attached branch-1 patch.
I will commit this to trunk and branch-2 shortly.

Slightly updated patch with two additions:

  1. Print the current number of tokens (we saw namenode going out of memory while creating an array in this part of the code, this will help debug it)
  2. Some code cleanup
Patch for branch-1.
builds.apache.org appears to be down.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12642944/HADOOP-10562.branch-1.1.patch
against trunk revision .

-1 patch. The patch command could not apply the patch.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/3883//console
